message: Sorry to bother—during the incident I’m seeing elevated 5xx on the checkout API after the 14:22 deploy (release 3.18.4); logs show `NullReferenceException: CartService.ApplyDiscount()` on `POST /checkout` with `traceId=9f2c...` and it started at 14:24. I’m about to roll back unless someone confirms whether we should instead disable the discount feature flag `discount_v2` to mitigate faster.
